testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to access the detailed information of the holiday with the specified id number via the API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request with invalid authorization and a holiday ID is sent to the /api/holidayDetails endpoint,
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/holidayDetails" path parameters....................passed * The api user prepares a GET request body to send to the api holidayDetails endpoint containing the information 3..passed * The api user sends a GET request body, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '401' with the reason phrase Unauthorized..passed
